mapper.insert: insert into book_info (name, author, publish, ISBN, introduction, language, price, pubdate, class_id, pressmark, state) values (#{name}, #{author}, #{publish}, #{isbn}, #{introduction}, #{language}, #{price},#{pubdate}, #{classId}, #{pressmark}, #{state})
mapper.update: update book_info set name= #{name} ,author= #{author} ,publish= #{publish} ,ISBN= ${isbn} ,introduction= #{introduction} ,language= #{language} ,price= #{price} ,pubdate= #{pubdate} ,class_id= #{classId},pressmark= #{pressmark} ,state= #{state} where book_id= #{bookId}
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM book_info WHERE book_id like #{sw} or name like #{sw}
